articles.title: Big hitting heroics from Daryl Mitchell and James Neesham help New Zealand stun England and move into T20 World Cup final
articles.description: New Zealand opener Daryl Mitchell carries his bat to become a cricketing hero as the Black Caps stun England and move into the final of the Twenty20 World Cup.
articles.content: Heroic late hitting from opening batsman Daryl Mitchell and all-rounder James Neesham has seen New Zealand claim a pulsating five-wicket Twenty20 World Cup victory over England and advance to the fin… [+739 chars]

articles.title: India:minaccia stupro figlia neonata capitano cricket, arrestato - Ultima Ora
articles.description:
Un ingegnere elettronico è stato arrestato a Mumbai per avere minacciato di stupro la figlia neonata
di Virat Kholi, il capitano della squadra nazionale indiana di cricket. (ANSA)
articles.content:
(ANSA) - NEW DELHI, 10 NOV - Un ingegnere elettronico è stato
arrestato a Mumbai per avere minacciato di stupro la figlia
neonata di Virat Kholi, il capitano della squadra nazionale

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
